title: A man couldn't go to his aunt's funeral, so he honored her with this photo of sheep forming a heart
content:
1. A man couldn't go to his aunt's funeral, so he honored her with this photo of sheep forming a heart  USA TODAY
  2. An Australian Sheep Farmer Uses His Animals To Offer A Tribute To His Late Aunt  NPR
  3. Farmer mourns beloved aunt by arranging feeding sheep in shape of heart  FOX 13 News Utah
  4. Australian farmer draws heart with sheep in tribute to aunt  BBC News
  5. Australian Farmer Herds Sheep to Form a Heart in Honor of His Late Aunt  PEOPLE
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 叔母の葬儀に参列できなかった男性が、叔母に敬意を表して、羊がハートを作っている写真を撮りました。
一名男子无法参加他姨妈的葬礼，所以他用这张羊群组成的心形照片来纪念她。
一名男子無法參加他姨媽的葬禮，所以他用這張羊羣組成的心形照片來紀念她。
